title: At least 5 killed in Texas shooting: Police
text:
Five people were killed, including a shooter, and around 21 were injured in a gun rampage in the cities of Midland and Odessa in west Texas on Saturday.

There are reports a suspect hijacked a U.S. mail carrier truck and was shooting at people at random.

Odessa Police Chief Michael Gerke said authorities are working on identifying the suspect.

(SOUNDBITE) (English) ODESSA POLICE CHIEF MICHAEL GERKE SAYING:

"He is a white male in his mid 30s. I don't have a positive identification on him, yet. I have an idea who he is, so I won't release that information until we're absolutely positive."

The shooter was reportedly shot and killed in a movie theater parking lot.

The shooting came after 22 people were killed at a Walmart store in city of El Paso, Texas earlier this month.

              The shooter was reportedly shot and killed in a movie theater parking lot. 
              The shooting came after 22 people were killed at a Walmart store in city of El Paso, Texas earlier this month.
